description:
Elon Musk's X refused to hand over hundreds of account details to British authorities during and after last summer’s riots, as the US billionaire attacked the Government for imprisoning people for social media posts.

The post Elon Musk’s X Refused to Give Users’ Details to Police After Southport Riots appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Elon Musk’s X Refused to Give Users’ Details to Police After Southport Riots

description:
Bridget Phillipson has been accused of allowing the Education Blob to run riot with her Schools Bill, slipping in horrors that the Tories rejected and moving the system towards the Nazi-style one that MPs rejected in 1944.

The post Phillipson is Letting the Blob Run Rings Around Her appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Phillipson is Letting the Blob Run Rings Around Her

description:
Rev Bernard Randall was sacked, branded a "safeguarding risk" and suspended by the Church of England for six years – all for telling pupils at his CofE school they didn't have to accept LGBT ideology. This is his story.

The post Sacked, Branded a “Safeguarding Risk” and Suspended by the Church of England – All for Telling Children They Don’t Have to Accept LGBT Ideology appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Sacked, Branded a “Safeguarding Risk” and Suspended by the Church of England – All for Telling Children They Don’t Have to Accept LGBT Ideology

description:
Ed Miliband has refused to calculate the cost of Net Zero, but former Professor of Economics Gordon Hughes has done it for him and the sums are eye-watering. "It’s a gas grid plus a bigger green energy one. Not cheap."

The post The Horrifying Truth About the Cost of Net Zero appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The Horrifying Truth About the Cost of Net Zero

description:
Climate change, Covid, war: the Establishment's string of emergencies with which to alarm and control the populace exposes its preferred mode of governance. But the self-serving narrative is wearing thin, says Ben Pile.

The post Climate, Covid, War: The Establishment’s Alarm Narrative is Wearing Thin appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Climate, Covid, War: The Establishment’s Alarm Narrative is Wearing Thin

description:

description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the ‘climate emergency’, public health ‘crises’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

title: News Round-Up
